tool_description: Evaluates visible and observable water quality indicators to assess contamination risks and determine purification requirements for natural water sources.

water_clarity.description: Visual clarity: crystal_clear, clear, slightly_cloudy, cloudy, murky, opaque

color_tint.description: Water coloration: colorless, slight_yellow, brown, green, red, blue, black, other

sediment_visible.description: Visible sediment or particles in water

algae_growth.description: Algae presence: none, minimal, moderate, heavy, bloom_conditions

debris_present.description: Visible organic or inorganic debris in water

insect_activity.description: Insect presence: none, few, moderate, many, swarms

taste_tested.description: Whether water has been safely taste-tested

taste_description.description: Taste characteristics if tested: neutral, metallic, salty, bitter, sweet, sulfurous

error_messages: Invalid clarity level: Use one of [crystal_clear, clear, slightly_cloudy, cloudy, murky, opaque].
Invalid color description: Use one of [colorless, slight_yellow, brown, green, red, blue, black, other].
Invalid algae assessment: Use one of [none, minimal, moderate, heavy, bloom_conditions].
Invalid insect activity: Use one of [none, few, moderate, many, swarms].
Invalid taste description: Use one of [neutral, metallic, salty, bitter, sweet, sulfurous, not_tested].
Surface conditions array empty: Provide at least one surface condition observation.
usage: Systematically observe and record all visible water quality indicators. Only taste-test water if you have basic purification available and start with minimal amounts. Use surface_conditions to describe foam, scum, oil sheens, or other surface phenomena.

overall_quality_rating.description: Overall assessment: excellent, good, fair, poor, dangerous

contamination_risk_level.description: Risk assessment: very_low, low, moderate, high, very_high

identified_concerns.description: List of specific quality concerns identified

purification_urgency.description: Treatment priority: minimal, standard, extensive, critical

safe_for_emergency.description: Whether water could be used in life-threatening emergency

quality_improvement_potential.description: How much quality could improve with basic settling/filtering
